\newcommand{\ottA}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{A}  ,\ \ottnt{B}  ,\ \ottnt{C}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{ \mathsf{B} }{}{}{}{\ottcom{Base type}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\mathsf{Unit}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{Unit}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{A}  \circop{}  \ottnt{B}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{Non-commutative tensor}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{A}  \circop{e}  \ottnt{B}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{Commutative tensor}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{A}  \circop{w}  \ottnt{B}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{Non-commutative tensor with weakening}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{A}  \circop{c}  \ottnt{B}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{Non-commutative tensor with contraction}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{A}  \rightharpoonup  \ottnt{B}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{Left implication}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{A}  \leftharpoonup  \ottnt{B}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{Right implication}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{A}  \multimap  \ottnt{B}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{Linear implication}}}
